topic: Topic: Recognition of the course Entrepreneurship for Students of Information Systems
question: I am studying computer science and would like to ask whether I can have the Entrepreneurship for Students of Information Systems course counted as my elective module Interdisciplinary Fundamentals. I am not sure which courses I can take for this and would like a more detailed explanation."
answer: You can take any module as interdisciplinary foundations that are part of your study plan. Please refer to the information on the interdisciplinary foundations website. There may also be modules that are mutually exclusive. You can also find information on this on the website for your degree program.
